text: Liam Walsh is a rugby league footballer who plays as a second-row forward for the Widnes Vikings in the Betfred Championship. In 2017 he made his Super League début for Widnes against the Leeds Rhinos. ==References== ==External links== *Widnes Vikings profile *SL profile *Leeds Rhinos v Widnes Vikings Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Rugby league second-rows Category:Widnes Vikings players
title: Liam Walsh (rugby league)
